subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy shot a 65 to take a three-shot lead over Y. E. Yang and Charl Schwartzel after the first round at Congressional Country Club.
snippet: Rory McIlroy shot a 65 to take a three-shot lead over Y. E. Yang and Charl Schwartzel after the first round at Congressional Country Club.
